description:
Fire versus Demon King Saqqara! Data versus Skull Bone Dragon!  Gantetsu versus Ancient Ordnance Moai!  Mayuyu versus Golem!  A never before seen four-way battle has begun!  A mysterious masked man watches over the battle?!  The story unfolds in an unexpected way!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 届け! ランプにかける想い
